### Description
As an developer, I want to be able to build master without any build script errors. 

### Steps to Reproduce (Bug)
1. run ./gradlew clean spotlessApply build

**Expected behavior:** Should be able to run the build without any issues

**Actual behavior:** The first time every time it fails with the following error
`
./gradlew clean spotlessApply build
Starting a Gradle Daemon, 1 incompatible and 1 stopped Daemons could not be reused, use --status for details
> Task :checkLicenses FAILED

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* Where:
Script '/home/perusworld/works/open/contrib/besu/gradle/check-licenses.gradle' line: 166

* What went wrong:
Execution failed for task ':checkLicenses'.
> java.io.FileNotFoundException: /home/perusworld/works/open/contrib/besu/build/reports/license/license-dependency.xml (No such file or directory)

* Try:
Run with --stacktrace option to get the stack trace. Run with --info or --debug option to get more log output. Run with --scan to get full insights.

* Get more help at https://help.gradle.org

BUILD FAILED in 39s
318 actionable tasks: 318 executed
`

**Frequency:** It happens the first time everytime and if i run the same command again, it runs without any issue

### Versions (Add all that apply)
* Java version: [openjdk 11.0.10 2021-01-19]
* OS Name & Version: [Ubuntu 20.04.2 LTS]
* Kernel Version: [5.8.0-48-generic]

### Additional Information

commands to reproduce all the time on mac and ubuntu 
**mkdir -p ./build/reports/license
touch ./build/reports/license/license-dependency.xml
./gradlew clean checkLicenses**
